title: Executive Order "Ending Weaponization of Federal Government" as Systematic Capture Tool
summary: Trump signs executive order claiming to end federal government weaponization while simultaneously implementing systematic capture mechanisms. Order coordinates across attorney general and agency heads to "root out politicized actions" against Trump allies, creating systematic framework for protecting political supporters while targeting perceived opponents through coordinated inter-agency effort.

sources.title: Ending The Weaponization Of The Federal Government – The White House
